version_description:
Updates
1. Tutorial
2. Guide System
3. Old Weapons
4. New Items for Crafting
5. New Skins

Master Improvements
1. Stats
2. Active Skills
3. Passive Skills

Monster Improvements
1. Stats Improvements
2. Pattern Adjustments

Other Improvements
- Adventure and Raid rewards have been improved
- Some Master and monster sounds that were omitted have been added.
- Certain UI images have been improved.
- Conditions for unlocking content have been added.

Other Improvements
- Adventure and Raid rewards have been improved
- Some Master and monster sounds that were omitted have been added.
- Certain UI images have been improved.
- Conditions for unlocking content have been added.

Updates
- Main Quest
- Hunting Field
- New products



Improvements
- Chat system
- Display of passive skill information
- Entry limit to the Training Dungeon

Updates
- Main Quest
- Hunting Field
- New products



Improvements
- Chat system
- Display of passive skill information
- Entry limit to the Training Dungeon

Updates
- New Adventure Stages
- New Raid
- Training Dungeon Expansion
- New Main Quest
- Guide Expansion


Improvements
- Improved the 'Stun' status debuff icon
- Improved the spamming prevention system in chat
- Improved the item storage system of daily products

Changes
- Fixed an issue of the Main Quest progress
- Fixed an error that occurred when using Growth Potions
